name: Goblin scouting party
description: A group of goblins with crude weapons, sent to scout ahead for a larger force.

name: Crumbled ruins
description: A section of the dungeon that has caved in or been destroyed. There may be hidden treasures to find, or dangerous areas to navigate.

name: Chasm crossing
description: A deep chasm that blocks the party's path.

name: Dwarven treasure trove
description: A hidden cache of treasure left behind by dwarves. It could be guarded, or there may be traps to avoid.

name: Orc ambush
description: A group of orcs lying in wait to attack the party.

name: Strange fungus
description: A type of glowing fungus that grows in the dungeon. It could have healing properties, or it could be poisonous.

name: Rat infestation
description: A swarm of rats that have taken up residence in the dungeon. They could be a minor nuisance, or they could lead the party to hidden areas.

name: Mysterious portal
description: A portal that leads to another realm. It could be guarded, or it could transport the party to a dangerous location.

name: Enchanted pool
description: A pool of water with magical properties. It could heal or harm those who drink from it.

name: Giant spider nest
description: A nest of giant spiders that have made the dungeon their home. They could be fought, or the party could try to sneak past.

name: Abandoned workshop
description: A workshop that was once used by craftsmen. It could have tools and materials that could be useful to the party.

name: Undead horde
description: A horde of undead creatures that have been raised by a powerful necromancer.

name: Friendly merchant
description: A friendly merchant with a cart of goods for sale

name: Ancient statue
description: A beautifully crafted statue of an unknown deity

name: Giant spider
description: Large spiders lurk in the shadows

name: Mysterious runes
description: Intricate runes etched into the dungeon walls

name: Goblin ambush
description: A group of goblins waiting to ambush unsuspecting adventurers

name: Collapsed tunnel
description: A tunnel that has caved in, blocking the path forward

name: Mysterious door
description: A strange door with mysterious symbols etched into it

name: Friendly ghost
description: A friendly ghost of a long-dead adventurer

name: Goblin Ambush
description: A group of goblins lying in wait for unsuspecting adventurers

name: Orc Patrol
description: A band of orcs out on patrol, looking for intruders in their territory

name: Giant Spider Nest
description: A nest of giant spiders guarding their young

name: Mimic Chest
description: A chest that is actually a shapeshifting mimic, waiting to attack unsuspecting treasure hunters

name: Specter Haunt
description: A specter that haunts the dungeon, seeking vengeance against the living

name: Skeleton Warriors
description: A group of undead warriors, still guarding their long-forgotten stronghold

name: Giant Centipede Swarm
description: A swarm of giant centipedes, crawling out of the walls and floor to attack the party

name: Ghoul Pack
description: A pack of ghouls, hunting for fresh flesh to feast upon

name: Giant Rat Infestation
description: A horde of giant rats, crawling out of the shadows and swarming the party
